Reviews.Title: Excellent value.  Works great and the box alone is worth the price.
Reviews.Author: dalepres "dalepres"
Reviews.Content: Awesome power supply for the price.  I am using this to power my security alarm sirens separately from my alarm supply  They do it very well.  THe box alone is worth more than the price of this power supply; in fact I might buy more just for the box for installing some of the other alarm accessories I need.

ProductInfo.Features:
DC 12V 3 Ampere Input AC 110-240V
Output: 12V DC 3A Terminal Connection / On/Off Switch
Use it with For Security Cameras, DVR's etc
Power BOX For electronic devices, like CCTV security cameras.CAN SUPPORT UP TO 9ch CAMERAS.
Box size is 6.25" x 6.25"
ProductInfo.Name: EVERTECH 4 Channel 3 Ampere PTC FUSE CCTV DVR Security Camera Metal Power Supply Box
